00078 #include "machine.h"
00079 #include "zesto-structs.h"
00080 
00081 #define MEMDEP_STAT(x) {if(!frozen) {x}}
00082 
00083 class memdep_t
00084 {
00085   protected:
00086     char * name;
00087     char * type;
00088     int bits;
00089     counter_t lookups;
00090     counter_t updates;
00091     bool frozen;
00092 
00093     void init(void); /* used for initializing common variables */
00094 
00095   public:
00096                  memdep_t();
00097     virtual     ~memdep_t();
00098     /* PC = program counter of the load for which we are predicting whether it may issue
00099        sta_unknown = earlier store address(es) still not computed
00100        conflict_exists = oracle information about whether a conflict exists with an earlier store
00101        partial_match = true if there is a partially-matching earlier store */
00102     virtual int  lookup(const md_addr_t PC, const bool sta_unknown, const bool conflict_exists, const bool partial_match) = 0;
00103     virtual void update(const md_addr_t PC);
00104     virtual void reg_stats(struct stat_sdb_t * const sdb, struct core_t * const core);
00105             void freeze_stats(void);
00106 };
00107 
00108 /* Create a new memory dependence predictor */
00109 struct memdep_t * memdep_create(const char * const);
00110
